extendedInfo.description: App Share(ShareMyApps):-This is the only app in market to share both app apk file or the link.Share your favorite apps with your friends!A fun and easy way to share the apps you love with your friends!Have an app you love that you want to share with a friend? Share Apps lets you share apps that you have on your phone with a friend by sending them an email or text message about the app with a link included or sharing the whole apk file . Downloading is made easy by sending them directly to the app's page on the Android Market. It's the best way to tell a friend quickly about your apps!Need help or have feedback? Email us at ankitthedev@gmail.com We'd love to hear from you.SHARE AN APP:-Tap the app*click on share link or share app.Select how you would like to share it(message,bluetooth,email,gmail,WhatsApp(if WhatsApp is installed)or any other etc).other features:-2)Quick uninstall apps you dislike.6)launch apps in one click.7)two sort modes to sort alphabetically or by size.8)Filtered system apps.9)view the app on market directly with one click.10)does one of your have updates check it with one click.11)View installed app information.12)view app size information.13)extremely fast and simple app share.14)  sharemyapps with one click.15) send share and email applications with one click.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!regarding the permission :-all for above ads.if the app force closes on your device or their is some kind of bug please mail me with your model number and android version and report problem with google play so that i can reply to you and solve your problem efficiently.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a good app becoz it allows u to share all d apps but....it allows only 2 apps to be shared at a time so i would rate it 4 stars
reviews.author: Prathamesh Deshmukh

reviews.title: 2 app at a time
reviews.comment: I would search for some other app! -_-

reviews.title: Link broken?
reviews.comment: I select all apps and sent myself my gmail... there is no links??  Only text and word...  Other developer (by Matt Lawrence) ShareMyApp is working...   Samsung Galaxy S Relay 4G ICS 4.0.4  UPDATED: CHANGED 1 TO 5 STARS.. I GOT DEV GMAIL AND EVERYTHING GO GOOD... THANK YOU DEV   ROY
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: I thought i will be able to send apk files...  Not good..... Just send a link that can noy be opend directly in watsapp
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fool
reviews.comment: For those who are dummies:- You can share apk files with these app just long press an app and select share app
